comments:
Hi,

I have created a plugin for Documentum DQL that user their DFC library. The 
plugin works fine in the Run-time Workbench but when I export and install it I 
get org.osgi.framework.BundleException and java.lang.ClassNotFoundException 
exceptions. I have noticed that all the other libraries are in use since I 
can't do anything to them while Eclipse is running but my plugin jar can be 
removed. Other funny thing is that all my view, editor & perspective icons work 
fine. What to do?

############# START LOG #############

Are you sure that the class Perspective is in the jar?

Hi Pascal,

Thanks for your quick responce!

I got it solved I used the 'Create an OSGi bundle manifest for the plug-in' 
option. Turning this of made whole thing work.

And yes the Class was in the jar.

Br, Chris
